title: unable to log into league or league support at this point
body:
Hello I have been down for 2 weeks now with very little communication with riot. Is there a more efficient way to communicate with a support agent to fix my issue. I was given a temporary password and it doesn't work so I can no longer even access my account on the support site. 

I believe the issue started when I changed my email and there was already an account tied to the email. Now both accounts are locked down and I can't log in. Is there anyway to just delete the lesser of my two accounts to see it this will resolve the log in issue. 

It's very disappointing that a log in issue would not be rectified with in two weeks.

Riot Please help.

Best Regards,

yodisjo

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the recovery issue, but don't worry we can help!  You can use an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), which doesn't require logging in.  This will go directly to our account recovery team who can assist with updating your information.  Hang tight, we'll get back to you!
